name: linter-phpmd
description: Lint PHP on the fly, using phpmd

executablePath.description: Enter the path to your phpmd executable.

autoExecutableSearch.title: Search for executables
autoExecutableSearch.description: Automatically search for `vendor/bin/phpmd` executable. Overrides the exectuable defined above.

rulesOrConfigFile.description: Enter path to ruleset file or a predefined rulesets.

disableWhenNoConfigFile.description: Disable the linter when the default ruleset file is not found.

autoConfigSearch.title: Search for ruleset files
autoConfigSearch.description: Automatically search for any `phpmd.xml`, `phpmd.xml.dist` or `phpmd.ruleset.xml` file to use as ruleset. Overrides custom ruleset(s) defined above.

minimumPriority.description: Rule priority threshold; rules with lower priority than this will not be used.

strictMode.description: Also report those nodes with a @SuppressWarnings annotation.
